name: winscp
title: WinSCP
description: Launch WinSCP sessions quickly from Raycast.

preferences.name: programPath
preferences.title: WinSCP Installation Folder
preferences.description: The folder where WinSCP is installed, only change this if the program is returning errors. You should find it at C:\Users\{user}\AppData\Local\Programs\WinSCP

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1

author: bossdaily
